item.description:
The monthly meetup at Hennessy's is a casual gathering to give us lonely MA Republicans an opportunity to meet one another. The recent crowds have included a great mix of long-time members and first-time attendees!

Come whenever you can for a drink or dinner, or simply for the conversation. There's no agenda, so feel free to talk politics, current events, jobs, sports, vacation plans, movies...

**********

The meetups are very informal and generally there is no agenda with the exception of announcements around 7:00. If you have something to share about a campaign, an event, a website, an organization, hereâ€™s your chance to tell the group. A sign-up sheet for announcements will be available from 6:00-7:00.

**********

You can find us in the back section by the TV and fireplace. We're usually there for a few hours.

If there is no event at the Garden, parking is $10 at the Government Center Garage.


Hope you can make it! Invite your friends!

Don't be discouraged by the small number of RSVPs on this site; we usually have 15-25 attendees!


Note: This meetup event is cross-posted at the Boston Republican Party Meetup Group and on Facebook.
item.how_to_find_us: Walk to the back section near the fireplace & TV.
item.name: Boston Republican June Meetup
